basics.name: Sanjay Radadiya
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer focused on performant web systems. Skilled Full Stack Developer. More than 8 years of professional web development experience. Nows & work on every stage of Software Development. From Requirement Analysis to Delivering product. Huge Passion about Software Design/Architecture & Applying the Best Engineering practices (clean/tested code). Easy to communicate, self-motivated and a great Team Member.

work.summary: Development and management of Web and Mobile application from Scratch (Idea - SDLC - Deployment).
highlights: Working with various JavaScript frameworks and libraries like Angular 4, Ionic 3, Node.js, Express Js, MySQL, MongoDB, etc...
Development of 10+ Websites, Web Apps, and Hybrid Mobile Apps
Development of REST Apis Using AWS lambda and API Gateways
Development of REST Apis Using Node.js and Express Js
Development of Hybrid mobile apps Using Ionic (2/3) and Angular (2/4)
Client communication and Client satisfaction is key

work.summary: One of the leading global providers of Information Technology services and advertising solutions With 2 domestic and 2 international centers and over 300 satisfied clients
highlights: Final year training under the guidance and supervision of Mr. Javed Sheikh and successfully completed my last year project Titled “Business on SMS System” using ASP.NET with C#.
